'''1.8.2-pre1''' is the first pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.8.2]], released on December 18, 2014.<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20141223094657/https://mojang.com/2014/12/minecraft-1-8-2-pre1-christmas-gift-edition/|title=Minecraft 1.8.2-pre1 – Christmas Gift Edition|date=December 18, 2014|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Searge]]}}</ref> This is the final pre-release released in 2014.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Debug screen]] '''
* New frame time graph.
** Activated by pressing Alt+F3 to display frame time bar chart in lower left of screen.

'''[[Statistics]]'''
* Added new statistics.
** Cake slices eaten
** Cauldrons filled
** Water taken from cauldron
** Armor pieces cleaned
** Banners cleaned
** Interactions with brewing stand
** Interactions with beacon
** Droppers searched
** Hoppers searched
** Dispensers searched
** Noteblocks played
** Noteblocks tuned
** Plants potted
** Trapped chests triggered
** Ender chests opened
** Items enchanted
** Records played
** Interactions with furnace
** Interactions with crafting table
** Chests opened

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[TNT]]'''
* Reverted explosion physics changes to those before the [[14w31a]] snapshot.
* Explosion force is no longer directionally biased.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Spectator]] mode'''
* Mobs no longer follow/attack the player in Spectator mode.

== Trivia ==
* This version was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
* 1.8.2-pre1 was released on the second latest calendar date out of all pre-releases, on December 18, only beaten by the [[Java Edition 1.4.7|1.4.7]] pre-release on December 28.
